channel.title: Verilog Blog on Learn Verilog with YoSys

item.title: Yosys to FPGA
item.description: YoSys can output synthesised designs targeted for Xilinx primitives. So lets have a go!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the start of the learning Verilog with YoSys blog. Well, we’d better start somewhere, and you’re going to need a working YoSys toolchain… so here we go!
